t: Amazon.com: Amazon Brand - Happy Belly Black Beans, 15 ounce (Pack of 1)
s: Happy Belly's black beans are also low in fat and sodium, making them a healthier option. Conclusion: While both brands of black beans are good, Happy Belly's black beans are a healthier option due to their lower sodium and fat content, higher fiber and protein content, and lack of preservatives.

t: Amazon.com: Amazon Brand - Happy Belly Pinto Beans, 15 ounce (Pack of 1)
s: I recently tried Happy Belly Pinto Beans for the first time, and I was very impressed. The beans were cooked perfectly, and they had a great flavor. They were also very affordable, which is always a plus. I made a simple bean soup with the Happy Belly Pinto Beans, and it was delicious.

t: Amazon Has Started Selling its Own Happy Belly Brand Coffee
s: November 23, 2016 - The initial coffee products under the brand are a house blend, breakfast blend, espresso roast, french roast and Italian roast decaf. All the 100-percent arabica blends are composed of Fairtrade- and organic-certified coffees from undisclosed places in the Central and South Americas, and they are being sold in ground or whole bean form in 12-ounce bags.
